summary: UPON DRIVING DOWN A BUSY ROAD, OUT OF NO WHERE I LOST MY POWER STEERING, ALMOST COLLIDING INTO A POST, AND GOT A NOTIFICATION THAT MY ESC FAILED RIGHT AFTERWARDS. THE STEERING IS NOW REALLY STIFF AND REQUIRES A LOT OF FORCE TO TURN. I TRIED SEARCHING THE REASON WHY THIS HAPPENS ONLINE AND FOUND A TON OF SIMILAR IF NOT THE EXACT SAME SITUATION AS MINE. THIS IS UNSAFE!!  *TR
